update public.apps

guid = #{record.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update public.apps set guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=OTHER}, production = #{production,jdbcType=BIT}, memory = #{memory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, instances = #{instances,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_descriptors = #{fileDescriptors,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disk_quota = #{diskQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_state = #{packageState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_hash = #{packageHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, droplet_hash = #{dropletHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, metadata = #{metadata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buildpack = #{buildpack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, space_id = #{spaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stack_id = #{stackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detected_buildpack = #{detectedBuildpack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staging_task_id = #{stagingTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kill_after_multiple_restarts = #{killAfterMultipleRestarts,jdbcType=BIT}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, not_deleted = #{notDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encrypted_environment_json = #{encryptedEnvironmentJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_buildpack_id = #{adminBuildpackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, health_check_timeout = #{healthCheckTimeout,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from public.apps
order by ${orderByClause}
select sum(memory*instances) from apps where state ='STARTED' and not_deleted = 'true'

if.test: organizations != null and organizations.name != null and organizations.name != ''
spaces != null and spaces.name != null and spaces.name != ''

mapper.select:
select distinct a."id", a."guid", a."name", a.memory, a.instances, a.disk_quota, a."state", a.package_state, a.created_at, s."id" as s_id, s."name" as s_name, o."id" as o_id, o."name" as o_name, st."id" as st_id, st."name" as st_name, (select array_to_string(ARRAY(SELECT unnest(array_agg(r.host || '.' || d.name))),'
') from public.apps_routes ar LEFT JOIN public.routes r ON r.id=ar.route_id LEFT JOIN public.domains d ON d.id=r.domain_id where ar.app_id =a.id) url from public.apps a left JOIN public.spaces s on s."id"=a.space_id LEFT JOIN public.organizations o ON o."id"=s.organization_id LEFT JOIN public.stacks st on st."id"=a.stack_id order by ${orderByClause}

select distinct
from public.apps
order by public.apps."created_at" desc

select distinct a."id", a."guid", a."name", a.memory, a.instances, a.disk_quota, a."state", a.package_state, a.created_at, s."id" as s_id, s."name" as s_name, o."id" as o_id, o."name" as o_name, st."id" as st_id, st."name" as st_name, (select array_to_string(ARRAY(SELECT unnest(array_agg(r.host || '.' || d.name))),'
') from public.apps_routes ar LEFT JOIN public.routes r ON r.id=ar.route_id LEFT JOIN public.domains d ON d.id=r.domain_id where ar.app_id =a.id) url from public.apps a LEFT JOIN public.spaces s on s."id"=a.space_id LEFT JOIN public.organizations o ON o."id"=s.organization_id LEFT JOIN public.stacks st on st."id"=a.stack_id order by a."created_at" desc
select count(*) from public.apps a left JOIN public.spaces s on s."id"=a.space_id LEFT JOIN public.organizations o ON o."id"=s.organization_id LEFT JOIN public.stacks st on st."id"=a.stack_id
